mapper.sql: product_id, product_code, product_name, product_desc, operator_code, product_type, area_code, active_period, quantity, product_price, product_cost, status, creator, create_time, updator, update_time, remark
mapper.select:
SELECT spi.product_id, spi.product_code, spi.product_name, spi.product_desc, spi.operator_code, CASE WHEN spi.operator_code = 0 THEN '全网' WHEN spi.operator_code = 1 THEN '移动' WHEN spi.operator_code = 2 THEN '联通' WHEN spi.operator_code = 3 THEN '电信' ELSE '国际' END as operator_name, CASE spi.area_code WHEN 0 THEN '全国' WHEN 1 THEN '国际' ELSE '-' END as area_codename, spi.product_type, CASE WHEN spi.product_type = 0 THEN '行业' WHEN spi.product_type = 1 THEN '营销' WHEN spi.product_type = 2 THEN '验证码' WHEN spi.product_type = 3 THEN '通知' WHEN spi.product_type = 7 THEN 'USSD' WHEN spi.product_type = 8 THEN '闪信' WHEN spi.product_type = 9 THEN '挂机短信' ELSE '国际' END as product_type_name, CASE spi.product_type WHEN 2 THEN CONCAT(ROUND(spi.quantity,4),"元") ELSE CONCAT(FLOOR(spi.quantity),"条") END as quantity_str, spi.area_code, spi.active_period, CASE spi.active_period WHEN 0 THEN '无限期' ELSE CONCAT(spi.active_period,"天") END as active_period_str, ROUND(spi.quantity,4) as quantity, ROUND(spi.product_price,4) as product_price,
spi.product_cost, spi.status, spi.creator, spi.create_time, DATE_FORMAT(spi.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as create_time_str, spi.updator,
spi.update_time, spi.remark, sa.clientid FROM t_sms_account sa INNER JOIN t_sms_agent_product sap ON sa.agent_id = sap.agent_id INNER JOIN t_sms_product_info spi ON sap.product_id = spi.product_id
ORDER BY spi.create_time desc LIMIT #{startIndex},#{pageSize}

select count(0) from ( SELECT 0 FROM t_sms_account sa INNER JOIN t_sms_agent_product sap ON sa.agent_id = sap.agent_id INNER JOIN t_sms_product_info spi ON sap.product_id = spi.product_id
) m

SELECT product_id, product_code, product_name, product_desc, operator_code, product_type, area_code, active_period, quantity, product_price, product_cost, status, creator, create_time, updator, update_time, remark FROM t_sms_product_info t WHERE t.product_code in
#{item}
